text: @NYGovCuomo You're willing to take from Upstate, when you have a stockpile, that you admitted to have, to basically leave upstate vulnerable. NYC isn't the only part of NY that's important. As I recall, upstate is bigger. But only the city matters to you, right? #COVID19 #UpstateNY
